title: The Carnelian Throne
description: Estri was a god, and the daughter of Light. Chayin was a god, and the son of darkness. Sereth was hase-enor, the son of all flesh. Lovers and freinds, could they be the prophesied three who would wield the Sword of Severance, Se'Keroth, and bring light out of dark?
author: Janet E. Morris
